title: Software Engineer || two offers | need inputs
content:
Hey Leetcode Community, Ive recently got couple of offers from Cisco and Qualcomm for Software Engineer roles. kindly help me with your suggestions or comments.
Education: B.Tech in Electrical Engineering 
Years of Experience: 4 years now
Prior Experience: Worked at Qualcomm before

**Offer 1:** 

Date of the Offer: October 2023
Company: Cisco
Title/Level: Software Engineer Grade 8
Location: Bangalore, India
Salary: 30LPA INR fixed 
Relocation: 0
Signing Bonus: 2 LPA +2 LPA INR
Stock bonus: No Stocks
Bonus: May provide stocks after 1 year + performance bonus around 10%
Benefits: 18 paid vacation days + 12 paid sick leave days + 10 paid Public holidays + 2 paid personal days + standard cisco benefits good IMO 
work mode: Fully remote 

**Offer** **2**:

Date of the Offer: October 2023
Company: Qualcomm India
Title/Level: Senior Embedded Software Engineer 
Location: Hyderabad 
Salary: 27LPA INR fixed
Relocation: 2.5LPA INR
Signing Bonus: 6LPA INR
Stock bonus: $30K stock grant vested over 3 years
Bonus: Performance-based bonus up to 20% of salary every year
Benefits: 20 paid vacation days + 12 paid sick leave days + 10 paid public holidays + standard Qualcomm benefits 
Other details: Negotiated once, couldn't match the fixed base pay of my first offer since stocks are provided.
work mode: 4 days in office 

*Both the roles are good skills and work wise but considering current market and all, please provide any inputs*
